mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expsub (expnum, expitemname, itemname, expquantity, expprice) VALUES (#{expnum}, #{expitemname}, #{itemname}, #{expquantity}, #{expprice})
mapper.select:
SELECT
expnum, expitemname, itemname, expquantity, expprice
FROM expsub
WHERE expnum = #{expnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE expsub SET expnum = #{expnum}, expitemname = #{expitemname}, itemname = #{itemname}, expquantity = #{expquantity}, expprice = #{expprice} WHERE expitemname = #{expitemname}
